description: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record.  The IDE_NUM table holds investigational device exemption (IDE) numbers to be reported on the claim.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: IDE_NUM
columns.description: This item holds the investigational device exemption (IDE) numbers for the services on the claim.
